events.comment: Spread debug
Initial properties
* Draw the central Pointer if active
Draw the crosshair; should be fully modular and changeable from the Options
* Draw the four main Quadrants of the Crosshair
Change Crosshair Color when Weapon is in range with a target
Sprint check: if Sprinting, Crosshair becomes a Pointer
ADS check: if Aiming, hide the Crosshair
Set position
Hide when not hitting anything
Check which Hitmarker show when hitting a Target: 1 is a standard shot, 2 is a headshot
Show/hide weapon select UI when changing
Manage UI animations

* Defines a small message under the crosshair, useful for discovering the interactions with all the systems in-game.

* The priority of these messages is defined by the position here in the event sheet, so higher-ups are lower priority.

* If the text returned is "BLANK", hide the Prompt.
* Set Prompt position at the center of the screen, under the crosshair
* Draw a background for the Prompt Text
* No bullet weapons equipped
* Pistol Reload
* AK Reload
* Pick Up Objects
* Door Interactions
* Key Messages
* Triggers
* Out Of Bounds prompt

parameters: "[spacing=3][color=red]Try to stay in the level, eh?[/red][/spacing]"

Convert to relative positions
Rotate those positions with radians
Convert the coordinates and apply the scale factor

Check the distance between Player and NavMarkers
Convert to relative positions
Rotate those positions with radians

Check if NavMarkers are within the Radar range, with the Distance var
Convert the coordinates and apply the scale factor

* Re-calculate using magnitude
* Apply the values and draw the Icon

Start an opacity tween
